articles.description: Xiaomi plans to launch a slew of new devices with the Poco branding soon. Two of those devices, the Poco X6 Pro 5G and Poco M6 Pro, have now had their most important specs outed, courtesy of Amazon listings online.
articles.content: Xiaomi is slated to debut the Poco X6 Pro, Poco X6, and Poco M6 Pro shortly, and details of those devices have now begun to surface on the grapevine. The Poco X6 Pro and Poco M6 Pro, in particular, a… [+1251 chars]

articles.content:
